doc.title: Jungle wa itsumo hale nochi Guu final
doc.plot: Hale's family receives a video letter from Weda's home in the city. Witnessing how sad and lonely Weda's mother and Bel are without her, Weda decides to take Hale and Guu back to the city for a while. After Hale complains about being bored and lonely without his friends in the jungle (as part of his plot to persuade his mother to take him back), Weda decides to send him to a private school in the city, where he instantly falls in love with a pretty girl named Rita. But, of course, Guu wants part of the action too.
